overview: I am interested in producing quality, maintainable software.

experience.title: Product Builder
experience.description: I optimize repetitive manual access patterns of atomic subproblems to create efficiency for humans in technical roles.

experience.title: VP of Engineering (Most Recent)
experience.description: When I started working at RTRS, I was the sole developer, a contractor, and my hours were capped at seven per week due to funding.  Years later, I led a team of engineers building a product being used by Fortune 500 companies. My leadership spanned mobile, web, and backend.
accomplishments: I focus heavily on API security of a multirole, multitenant application.
Wrote over 1000 integration/unit tests for Django/DRF.
Automated deployments and code quality checks using Github Actions.

experience.title: Senior Systems Administrator
accomplishments: Greenfielded a multimillion dollar research computing infrastructure. Executed core buildout and consolidated disparate source environments.
Led the design and implementation of a bioinformatics data analysis and tool pipeline platform. Automated filesystem hierarchy and POSIX ACL consistency with web data libraries.

Developed a custom ERP system in Ruby on Rails. Coded numerous core features including metered cloud billing, client invoicing, mainframe transaction processing, roll-up multidimensional reporting, subsidization tracking, automatic asset lifecycle initiation, and role-based security.
Wrote a Python provisioning tool for synchronizing IAM objects between Internet2 Grouper, Centrify DirectControl, and Isilon OneFS. Achieved global UID/GID to SID coherency.

experience.title: Security Engineer
accomplishments: Identified point in time ownership of IP addresses by designing a common information model, metadata abstraction schema, and time series correlation logic for billions of unstructured events. Performed index tuning and optimization.
Authored a multi-user GnuPG wrapper for facilitating granular access control to privileged passwords.
Performed Expect.pm automation against an IP network comprised of 2000+ programmable assets.
Implemented cross-platform PKI authenticated IPsec. Achieved proficiency in IKE debugging.
Deployed a vendor-neutral network ACL management and provisioning platform.

education.credential: Bachelor of Business Administration (Management Information Systems)
